question: In some parts of our country, apart from rabi and kharif , Zaid crop is grown from March to June. Which among the following comes under Zaid crop?
explanation: Zaid crop is grown in some parts of country during March to June. Prominent examples are Muskmelon, Watermelon, Vegetables of cucurbitacae family such as bitter gourd, pumpkin, ridged gourd etc.
